Crocus DocumentationÂ¶

Crocus is a small and experimental async web microframework built on top of aiohttp (required python 3.5+).

pip install crocus
  • Introduction: framework introduction, installation, features, etc;
  • API Reference: full framework API reference;
  • Examples: code samples;
  • Changelog: framework changelog list.
